title: Fragments, ""Oiseaux et ecureuils" (Birds and squirrels)", ca. 1806
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate, plain weave foundation
markings: Partial stamp at top of A: "MANUFACTURE DE OBERKAMPF A JOUY" with a box outline.
dimensions:
A: Warp: 98cm (38 1/2in.). Weft: 63.5cm (25in.) Both edges cut but plate edge shows on the right side. 
B. Warp: 115.5cm (45 1/2in.). Weft: 92cm (36 1/4in.) Both edges cut.
Pattern: Height of repeat: 52cm (20 1/2in.)
Designed for lengths to be sewn together as a straight repeat.
description: Horizontal arrangement of putti holding fruiting branches of grapes and apples with squirrels and parrots. Sphinx topped by nesting bird feeding its young and vases of flowers on background of a rigid arrangement of leaves. Printed in brown on white and designed for lengths to be sewn together as a straight repeat.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, ""Oiseaux et ecureuils" (Birds and squirrels)", ca. 1806.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate, plain weave foundation. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-58-a,b.
